All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Represents the main class of the game.
AppState
Enumeration representing the different states of the application.
Board
Represents the game board and manages the game.
BoardController
Represents the controller for the board in the game.
BoardUI
Represents the ui of the game board.
BoardView
Panel for displaying the game board.
Client
Represents a player in the Akropolis game.
Controller
Represents the controller base class for each controller in the game.
District
Represents a district in the game.
DistrictColor
Represents the color of a district
DistrictView
Represents the view of a district in the game.
GameOverState
Represents the game over state.
Grid
Represents the grid of the game board, containing hexagons in different positions.
GridController
Represents the controller for a grid in the game.
Hexagon
Represents a tile on the game grid.
HexagonOutline
Implements a hexagon outline view.
HexagonView
Represents a hexagon on the game grid.
HexagonViewFactory
This class is used to create the hexagon views It's a convenient way to create hexagon views based on the model
LeaderBoard
Represents the leaderboard of the game.
MainMenuView
Represents the main menu view.
Model
This class is the template that all models must follow
Pair<K,V>
Represents a pair of objects.
Place
Represents a place in the game.
PlaceView
Represents a place on the game grid.
Player
Represents a player in the Akropolis game.
PlayingState
Represents the state of the game when it is being played.
Point3D
Represents a point in 3D space.
Quarries
Represents a quarries in the game.
QuarriesView
Implements a quarries view.
RockLabel
Represents the label that indicates to the user their current rock count.
ScoreDetails
 
ScrollableGridView
Represents a scrollable grid view.
ScrollableGridView.GridView
Represents the game grid displayed in game.
Server
Represents the server in the game.
SettingsPanel
In this panel, the user can change the settings of the game.
SettingsParser
This class is used to parse the settings file
Site
Represents a site in the game A site is a collection of tiles where the player can pick tiles from
SiteController
Represents the controller for a site in the game.
SiteView
Represents the site in the game.
SoundManager
This class is used to manage the sounds of the game
StackTiles
Represents a stack of tiles in the game.
StartingLogoState
The state that shows the starting logo
StartState
Represents the state of the game when it is starting.
State
This class is the base class for all states
StateMachine
This class is the template that all state machines must follow
StatesMethods
This class is the template that all states must follow
TextureFactory
This class is a factory for loading images.
Tile
This class represents a tile that the player can set onto the board.
TileController
Represents the controller for a tile in the game.
TileView
Represents a single tile in the game.
TileViewFactory
This class is used to create the tile views It's a convenient way to create tile views based on the model
Timeline
Represents a timeline that executes actions at specified intervals.
Timeline.KeyFrame
Represents a key frame in the timeline.
TriangleButton
Represents a button that has a triangle shape.
UIController
Represents the controller for the UI of the game.
UIFactory
This class is a factory for creating UI elements.
View
This class is the template that all views must follow It just serves as a marker for the view classes
